path.style: fill: rgb(255, 199, 199); fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; fill-opacity: 1;
fill: rgb(199, 238, 255); fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; fill-opacity: 1;
fill: rgb(255, 255, 185); fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; fill-opacity: 1;
fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 2; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.5; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1.5; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 12, 12; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;
fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 4, 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 4, 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 4, 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: 4, 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-size: 40px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Bitstream Vera Sans;
